VUPShionMod:PrayerStance.NAME: Praying Stance
DESCRIPTION: While in this #yStance, you deal #b25% less damage. NL At the end of your turn, heal #b2 HP.

VUPShionMod:SpiritStance.NAME: Wordpower Stance
DESCRIPTION: Upon entering this #yStance, gain #b1 #yImmolated and #yStrength. NL At the end of your turn, heal #b2 HP.
